scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn firebaserc && parcel build --dist-dir dist
scripts.build:dev: yarn clean && yarn firebaserc && parcel watch --dist-dir dist
scripts.start: yarn build:dev & sleep 15 && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" USE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS="true" firebase emulators:start & yarn workspace @recap/seeder start:emulate
scripts.start:functions: yarn build:dev & cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.clean: rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist misc/firebaserc.d.ts misc/firebaserc.d.ts.map misc/firebaserc.js misc/firebaserc.js.map misc/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
